thread.title: BRIEF-CTG To Commence Tender Offer To Purchase Up To 10 Pct Of Outstanding Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CTG To Commence Tender Offer To Purchase Up To 10 Pct Of Outstanding Common Stock
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Computer Task Group Inc:
* CTG ANNOUNCES INTENT TO COMMENCE TENDER OFFER TO PURCHASE UP TO 10 PCT OF OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK
* COMPUTER TASK GROUP- ‍BOARD APPROVED CASH “MODIFIED DUTCH AUCTION” TENDER OFFER TO COMMENCE IN NEAR FUTURE TO BUY UP TO 10% OF OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK​
* COMPUTER TASK GROUP INC - ‍OFFER PRICE PER SHARE WILL BE DETERMINED PRIOR TO COMMENCEMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
